verbs.description: " Trump 's more concerned about Tomi Lahren [V: being] splashed with water than Flint still being entirely without safe water . "
" Trump 's more concerned about [ARG2: Tomi Lahren] being [V: splashed] [ARG2: with water] than Flint still being entirely without safe water . "
